text: The snow covered Alps stand out clearly in the light of a moon.  A fortress-like CHATEAU is situated in a flat sadd forest partway up the mountain, next to a frozen lake.  T property is surrounded by high stone walls, and the state grounds are bathed in floodlights and patrolled by armed with dogs.

The driveway and motorcourt are filled with cars.  A form dress party is in progress... a private reception for a m eastern dignitary.  Tuxedoes men escort their diamond-enc ladies through the huge front doors, where they doff thei overcoats and are politely scanned with hand-held metal detectors by white gloved security staffers. The walled perimeter of the house runs along the lake, fo a kind of rampart.  There is an opening, to a kind of wat or canal, which connects to the private docks inside the grounds.  There is a steel grating across the opening.  T bars disappear down into the thin ice of early winter. With the house visible BG, we CRANE DOWN below the parape along which a guard is a white exposure-suit is walking.. along the dark wall to the grating... TILTING DOWN to see glow pulsing under the ice.

Camera moving toward:  A FIGURE in diving gear working at metal bars with an oxygen arc cutting torch.  One bar has already been cut out.  Two quick cuts and a second bar fa the muddy bottom.  Lit now only from the floodlights filt down through the ice, the figure slips through the bars a swims powerfully along the stone canal wall. Seem from below, the figure is a black shadow moving agai the rippled-glass of the ice above.

A dock extends into the frozen canal, just behind a large boathouse.  There is a faint chipping sound.  The ice bre quietly, and the pieces are slid back.  A head appears, i rubber drysuit hood.  The DIVER slips the regulator out o mouth and turns slowly, scanning...  revealing: HARRY TASKER.  Our hero.  Harry floats with just his eyes the surface, silent as a water snake, as a guard passes o footpath nearby. After a few beats Harry slips out of his tanks and fins, letting them sink, and climbs the frozen ladder onto the He moves like a ninja into the shadows of the boathouse. Opening a WATERPROOF BAG, he pulls out a walky talky.
Honey, I'm home.
Meet Harry's partner, ALBERT "GIB" GIBSON, an overweight year-man with a lived in looking face.  Gib answers Harry his headset.
Roger that.  (he covers the mike and turns) Hey, Fize!  Get your butt in here.  Harry's inside.

Outside, FAST FAISIL, an Iranian-American, finishes makin yellow snow and hurries back to the van.  They are parked winding mountain road a half-mile from the chateau, whose lights are visible through the trees. Faisil jumps in and goes to the eyepiece of a huge teleph nightvision scope.  The eerie green image lurches as he s the grounds, locating the boathouse.

Concealed in the shadows, Harry is shucking out of his dr Underneath is he is wearing black tux pants, suspenders, cummerbund and a formal shirt.  He puts a tiny plug, like hearing aid, deep in his ear canal.  A SUB-VOCAL TRANSCEI Very advanced.
Switching to sub-vocal.  Gib, you copy?
It's Talkradio.  You're on the air.

Harry slips into his shoulder harness... holster on one s containing his .45 auto Glock-22, and the transmitter pac the ear-piece slung on the other.  He slips on a formal j concealing the rig.  Then a final touch.  A little afters from a tiny plastic vial. Harry adjusts his bow-tie and strides confidently out of shadows, crossing quickly to the main house.  He looks ultrasharp in his black tux with the white silk cummerbun his hair slicked back.  He enters the main house through service entrance.
Harry strides through the huge kitchen like he owns the p The kitchen staff are scurrying around, too busy to reall notice.  He finger-tastes a dish as he passes.
(French/ subtitled) This needs more garlic.
He breezes through unchallenged, exiting into the--

Here the party is in full swing.  Harry blends smoothly i the crowd of foreign dignitaries, businessman and minor m east nobility.  They are a high-octane mixture of new oil and old European money, and run the spectrum from stodgy bankers to playboy arms dealers. Harry strolls amiably among the glittering woman, the cig smoking men, casually snagging a glass of champagne and a canape from the passing waiters.  He nods to someone as i knows them.  Greets another is quite fluent Arabic.  Peop his wake look at each other like "Do you know him?"   The shrug, go on with their conversation.  Harry moves throug crowd.  Scanning.
There's Daddy Petrobucks.

HARRY'S POV - Through the crowd is sees JAMAL KHALED, the of the party and owner of the chateau.  He is fat and ani greeting guests with a flourish.  As Harry watches he war greets a beautiful WOMAN.  They become absorbed in a conversation. The woman glances up and sees Harry checking her out.  Th a frank moment of returned interest.  Then the crowd shif cutting off their view of each other.
Harry makes his way up the grand staircase to the second He slips through doors into the private area of the mansi
The doors open and Harry slips into the darkened library. crosses quickly to a window and opens it onto a terrace.
Harry goes onto the terrace, and in a display of acrobati prowess, he pulls himself up onto the third floor balcony directly above.  He lets himself into--

Khaled's office is ornately furnished.  Beautiful antique glint in the moonlight coming in the French-doors.  Harry crosses to an immense desk and boots up the computer ther Bathed in the glow from the screen, he pulls a FLAT BOX, the size of a paperback,  from the back of his cummerbund connects it quickly to the modem port in the back of the computer.
Modem in place.  Transmitting... now.
He pushes a button and a green light comes on.
Gib and Faisil watch as their monitor screen lights with from Khaled's private computer.
Affirmatory.  We are in.                               *
Fast Faisil is a computer ace.  His fingers fly on the ke as he types rapid key commands.  We see familiar "windows appear".  The words are all in Arabic characters.
These are encrypted files, guys. This is going to take me a few minutes.

TIGHT ON LIBRARY DOOR.  It opens a crack and a dental mir comes out, looking around like a U-boat periscope.  Seein coast is clear Harry slips out.  But just as he is closin door, a GUARD rounds the corner ten feet away.  Harry tur smoothly.  He smiles sheepishly and moves toward the guar
(In Arabic/ subtitled) Where's the john around here?  I have to take a major leak.
The guard points warily down the corridor.  Harry nods an heads that way, back toward the party.

Harry comes down the staircase amid the glitter of the pa He is sipping champagne and looking bored.  He sees two security guys moving purposefully through the crowd towar stairs, walkies in their hands.  He turns away as they pa and pretends to study a large fragment of bas-relief... a temple frieze depicting a war chariot drawn by four horse He senses someone next to him and turns.  It is the WOMAN is captivatingly beautiful, and her gaze is piercing.
(indicating the bas- relief) Magnificent, isn't it?
Yes.  Hi, I'm Juno Skinner.  I thought I knew most of Khaled's friends but I don't believe I know you.
Harry offers his hand to her.
Renquist.  Harry Renquist.
Gib whirls to the screen displaying the mission database. scans rapidly for--
Skinner.  Skinner.  Come on...
Gib finds the entry he's looking for.  Juno's picture and appear on the screen.
Juno Skinner.  Art and antiquities dealer, specializing in ancient Persia.
Harry turns back to the fragment of frieze.
This is Persian, if I'm not mistaken.
Very good.  It's sixth century B.C.  Do you like the period?
(shameless) I adore it.

Seen through the starlight scope, we see one of the guard shining his light on the hole in the ice and then on Harr footprints leading to the boathouse.  He calls to one of other guards, who comes running over.
Harry, still with Juno, hears Gib in his ear:
Harry, we got a problem.  Guards are swarming all over the dock.

Harry glances up the stairs.  Khaled's SECURITY CHIEF is gesturing to several of his men, and speaking quickly int walky.  Three SECURITY MEN come down the stairs, scanning crowd.  Harry turns smoothly away from them and takes Jun arm.
Do you dance, Ms. Skinner?
He steers her toward the dance floor.
Gib, listening, rolls his eyes.  He looks through the nig vision scope.  Guards are running around outside the chat Harry's stirred up the hornet's nest.  Faisil is still ja at the keyboard.
Okay, files are unlocked.  I'm in. I'm down, baby.  I got my hand up her dress and I'm going for the gold.  I'm--
Just copy the goddamn files! (into his headset) Harry, don't be stopping to smell the roses, now.  You hear me, Harry?

Harry whirls Juno aggressively across the dancefloor.  Sh responds deftly.  They are well matched.  She parries eac his smooth moves with a flourish.  It is a contest of wil and a surprised appraisal for each that the other is wort Juno is hot.  He bends her back at the waist, then snaps up.  She twirls into the crook of his arm.  Their faces a inches apart.  Wow.  The music ends and she gives him a w grin.
Well.  And I thought this was going to be just another bunch of boring bankers and oil billionaires.
Harry, seconds count, buddy. Ditch the bitch, let's go.
Unfortunately, Juno, I have a plane to catch.
She slips a card out of a pocket in her otherwise sheer d She hands it to him, maintaining eye contact.  Serious sp
Call me, if you'd like to see some of my other pieces.
I'd like that.
Gib can't believe this conversation.
(to Faisil) Son of a bitch is with her two minutes and she's ready to bear his children (to Harry) What's your exit strategy Twinkle Toes?

Harry nods to the security men at the door as he strides confidently through.  He goes down the steps to the broad terrace above the motor court.  Behind Harry, a GUARD low his walky talky and starts after him.
May I see your invitation, sir?
Without turning, Harry slips a small flat box out of his pocket.  A REMOTE DETONATOR.
Here's my invitation.                                  *
He pushes the button and-- KABOOM!  The  second floor office windows blow out in a f explosion.  Using the diversion, Harry leaps off the terr before the guard can open fire.
Gib sees the rising fireball a half-mile away.  He starts van.
Aw, shit.  Here we go--

Harry sprints across the snow-covered lawn, through the t Guards with automatic weapons run after him, firing.  The explodes around him with bullet hits. TWO DOBERMANS pelt toward Harry, leaping at him in perfec unison.  He waits... and knocks their heads together in m leap with a crack like a baseball bat.  The dogs drop to snow, wobbling around like they're drunk. As Harry sprints on, ANOTHER DOBERMAN lunges out of the b ahead, leaping directly for his throat.  Harry grabs the and shot-puts him up into a tree without breaking stride. Fu.  The dog yelps and scrambles to hold onto an icy bran looking down in amazement.

Harry leaps down on the outside of the wall, hitting a sn bank and sliding downhill.  He sprints down the gentle sl toward the highway. Harry looks back as TWO GUARDS ON SKIS come out of a guar station beside the main entrance. TRACKING WITH THE SKI-GUARDS, searching through the trees lights.  They have lost Harry.  They stop.  A snowbank be them EXPLODES as Harry leaps out.  He disables them both vicious street-fighter moves.  Harry looks upslope as-- A service gate opens in the perimeter wall and TEAMS OF SECURITY MEN in white snow-suits pour out, some on skis, on SNOWMOBILES.  A HELICOPTER rises over the wall in a bl swirling snow.  Its xenon lights rake through the trees, casting lurid wheeling shadows on the snow. ON Harry, snapping closed the ski boots he has stolen fro of the disabled guards.  He pops the boots quickly into t bindings and takes off downhill with one of the guard's F rifles slung across his back. The helicopter swoops downhill, its searchlight blazing t the forest.  Snowmobile headlights illuminate the ski-pat zig-zagging among the trees. Harry slashes expertly downhill.  He cuts a distinguished figure in his black tux.  Automatic weapons fire rips thr the trees from behind him.  Harry is going flat-out.  The light hits him.  A 7.62 mm machine gun in the chopper rip slope into white clouds around him.  Harry slashes, turns weaving among the trees at breakneck speed.  A snowmobile closing in, outflanking him.  He turns toward it, suddenl Hits a mogul.  Uses the air to slash his skis right acros rider's face.  The snowmobile crashes and tumbles into th night.
GIB'S VAN takes an icy turn in a hairy slide. INSIDE Gib is peering upslope, trying to see what's going All he can see are lights and gunfire.
Harry, what's your twenty?  I need a position, buddy--
Suddenly a skier in a black tux launches across the road the slope above, RIGHT OVER THE VAN, and lands deftly downslope.
Uh... right!  I'll catch you on the next bend.
Behind the van, pursuing guards leap across the road.  On about half can make the jump.  The rest crash horribly. helicopter thunders overhead.

Harry sees the chopper start an attack run.  He comes out the open, going straight downhill like a rocket.  The cho gets suckered in...  trying to hit him, getting right dow behind him... and suddenly-- Harry slides to a stop in an explosion of powder and whips up the rifle.  P-P-P-POW! rakes a burst across the windshield.  The startled pilot swerves and-- Suddenly two tall pine trees are right in f of him. K-WHACK!  The main-rotor blade snaps clean off and the ch drops into the snow, plowing into a snowbank.  It slides to the edge of a steep ridge and stops, teetering. Firing from a snowmobile, one of the guards puts a burst across Harry's path.  Harry's skis are hit and he tumbles comes out of it...  running down the hill like a juggerna his heavy boots.  He has lost the rifle somewhere in the Harry takes cover behind the burning wreck of the downed chopper, which still has its engine running.  The ski pat opens fire from upslope.  Rounds whacking against the dis helicopter. Harry looks down the slope and gets an idea.  He jerks th unconscious pilot out and pushes on the fuselage, rocking It slips over the edge.  He leaps inside as it topples fo and slides down the slope.

Harry adds throttle and works the footpedals, using the t rotor to steer.  The chopper had snow-skids, and Harry is skiing the damn thing down the mountain. The copter is burning as it rockets down the slope on its skids.  Bullets are hitting the fuselage, and everything it.  Skiers are wiping out, hitting trees.  A snowmobile a rock and flies spectacularly into a ravine.
Harry!  Where are you!
In the helicopter.
Gib slides the van around a curve.
(deadpan, to Faisil) He's in the helicopter.

Big is scanning above for the chopper.  Then upslope he s the burning fuselage skiing expertly among the trees. The chopper hits a jump and launches into the air-- It cr through trees, still soaring and-- Gib looks up, screamin The chopper drops right toward him-- He hits the brakes a BLAMMO!  It drops onto the road ten feet in front of the skidding van...  then slides over the edge and tumbles in rocky canyon where is BLOWS UP!  The fireball lights up t night. Gib and Faisil jump out of the van.  They look downslope burning wreckage.
Harry?  HARRY?!
What?

Gib and Faisil spin to look behind them.  Harry is lodged tree-branches hanging over the road.  Gib hands his MP-5K machine gun to Faisil and reaches up to Harry, who grabs hand and pulls.  Harry tumbles down into the snowbank.  H stands, brushing snow off his tux, and clomps toward the his ski-boots.  He is completely unruffled.
Let's go.  We can still make our flight.

As Faisil is getting into the van behind Harry, TWO GUARD ON SNOWMOBILES roar around the bend behind them, fish-tai on the ice.  Faisil OPENS FIRE.  One snowmobile swerves o the embankment.  The other pulls up broadside, and the gu duck behind it.  Gib floors it and the van roars down the mountain.  Faisil is still Ramboing on full-auto.
This is GREAT!!  I never get to shoot!
An American Airlines 747 touches down amid puffs of tire
A NON-DESCRIPT SEDAN pulls to the curb in a neighborhood modest middle-income tract homes.  The street is deserted is 4 A.M.  Gib is at the wheel, dropping Harry off at his house.

Harry is emptying his pockets... passport, business cards All documents under his name "Renquist".  He double check his pants and jacket pockets and empty.  Gib fastidiously the items into a plastic zip-lock.
Empty.  Go.
Gib starts handing him items from a briefcase.  This shou feel like a tired ceremony between them.
Harry Tasker wallet.  Harry Tasker passport.  Plane ticket stub, hotel receipt, Tasker.  Two postcards of Lake Geneva.  House keys.  Souvenir snowing Swiss village.
Gib snows him how is snows when you shake it up and turn over.
What's this for?
For Dana, schmuck.  Bring your kid something.  You know.  The dad thing.
Got it.  Nice touch.  Okay, pick me up at eight.  The de-brief is at ten hundred.
Harry opens the car door.
Hey, hey, hey... what are we forgetting?
Gib holds up Harry's gold wedding band.  Harry puts it on
What a team.  See you at eight.
Yep.  Sleep fast.

Harry slips inside.  He sets down his suitcase and walks quietly down the hall.  He pauses at a door with lurid la and stickers plastered all over it (Toxic Waste,  STAY OU IT'S TOO LOUD YOU'RE TOO OLD, etc.) Harry silently opens the door and looks in at his sleepin daughter, DANA.  She looks like an angel in the moonlight coming in the window.  In fact, she is a typical 14 year girl, and therefore hardly an angel.  But to Harry she is unflawed.

Harry, undressed now, slips into bed next to... a lump in covers which we presume to be a human being.  This is HEL TASKER, Harry's wife of 15 years.  He kisses her on the c and she stirs.  She rolls toward him, giving him a sleepy and a kiss.
(a drowsy murmur) Hi, honey.  How was the flight?
Fine, honey.  Stay asleep.
Okay.
As she drifts off, Harry puts his head on the pillow and at the ceiling.
TIGHT ON SWISS VILLAGE.  It is snowing. ON DANA,  reaching to the present Harry just gave her.
Hey, thanks dad.  I never had one of these.

They are in her room, which is your basic room from Hell. Pearl Jam posters, and an unbelievable clutter of junk, magazines and cheap jewelry.  Harry kisses her on the che which she submits dutifully.  He looks at his watch and h for the door.
You better hurry.  You're going to be late for school.
Harry hurries out and Dana considers the Swiss village a moment.
Really lame.
She plonks is straight in the wastebasket.
Harry strides down the hall, avoiding their small but incredibly ugly dog, GIZMO, who skitters past him going t other way.
Dana, don't forget to feed Gizmo!                      *

Harry crosses the bedroom, hurrying past Helen who is cle rushing to get ready herself.  We get our first good look Helen.  She is wearing a terrycloth robe as she picks out outfit.  Her hair is wrapped in a towel.  To call her pla would be inaccurate.  She could be attractive if she put effort into it, which doesn't occur to her.
I'm late.
Me too.
They talk without looking at each other, the way people w have been together a long time do.
How'd it go at the trade show? You make all the other salesmen jealous?

Yeah.  You should have seen it. We were the hit of the show with the new model ordering system, the one for the 680... how you can write up an order and the second the customer's name goes into the computer, it starts checking their credit, and if they've ordered anything in the past, and if they get a discount...
She is already tuning him out.  And it hits us:  SHE HAS IDEA WHAT HARRY REALLY DOES.
(barely listening) That's fabulous Harry.
Yeah, it was wild.
Harry glances at her, oblivious to him and brushing her t He smiles.  The best lies are told with enthusiasm.
Gib opens the door, knocks a bit, then strolls in like he there.  He is wearing dark Ray Bans, like he's doing a Ro Orbison impression.  Gizmo runs toward him, yapping, but gives him the evil eye.
Come any closer I'll kill you.

The dog backs up, whining plaintively.  Gib throws his ja over the back of the couch and then, inexplicably, he tak a pack of CAMELS and sets it on the mantelpiece.  He adju its position carefully.  Hmmmm.
Harry  and Helen maneuver around each other expertly.  Sh doing her make-up.
The plumber came yesterday.  He said they have to dig under the slab or something and it's going to be six hundred dollars to fix.
Harry is not really paying attention as he ties his tie i front of the mirror.  His mind is elsewhere.  He couldn't less about there domestic problems.
Uh huh.  Okay.
It's not okay.  It's extortion.
What did you tell him?
I slept with him and he knocked off a hundred bucks.
Good thinking, honey.
Harry kisses her on the cheek and exits.
Gib enters and pours two cups of coffee.  Dana is drinkin orange juice from the bottle at the fridge.
Hi, kid.
Hey, Gib.  What up?
She EXITS, eating an uncooked pop-tart.  Harry comes in a second later and Gib hands him his coffee.
Thanks dear.
Here, check these out.

Gib hands Harry the glasses.  Harry studies them, seeing VIRTUAL VIDEO DISPLAY inside the left lens of the Ray Ban Harry glances down the hall, making sure no-one is lookin then he puts them on. HARRY'S POV - INSIDE THE GLASSES - A black and white vide image of his own living room.
The CCD camera and transmitter and inside a pack of smokes. Slick little unit, huh?

IN POV we see Dana enter the living room.  She looks arou carefuly, then quickly lifts Gib's jacket and slips out h wallet.  She palms two twenties in the blink of an eye an the wallet back.  Pro moves.
Son of a bitch!
What?
Harry whips off the glasses and charges out of the kitche Gib goes after him.

Dana comes out the front door, letting it slam behind her runs to her boyfriend, TRENT, who is waiting for her in t driveway on his idling YAMAHA.  Trent is 16, dressed in g rock style, trying to look tough.  Harry comes out the fr door as Trent revs the motor.
Dana!!
She waves from the back of the bike as Trent pops the clu and they shoot down the driveway.
(yelling over the engine) Can't stop, I'm late.  Bye, Dad!
They are driving through D.C.  Harry is still shocked by daughter's behavior.
Kids.  Ten seconds of joy. Thirty years of misery.
She knows not to steal.  I've taught her better than that.

Yeah, but you're not her parents, anymore, you and Helen.  Her parents are Axl Rose and Madonna. The five minutes you spend a day with her can't compete with that kind of constant bombardment. You're outgunned, amigo.
Gib and Harry turn onto Pennsylvania Avenue, heading towa Lafayette Square.  Capital Hill is behind them.

Harry and Gib come out of an elevator on the 12th floor. Behind the receptionist is a burnished metal sign which r TEKTEL SYSTEMS.  They cross a open floor of cubicle space There is the hum of activity everywhere.  A normal day at normal business.
Morning, Mr. Tasker.                                   *
Morning, Charlene.
See, kids now are ten years ahead                      * of where we were at the same age. You probably think she's still a virgin--
Don't be ridiculous.  She's only -- how old is she?
Fourteen, Harry.
Right.  She's only fourteen.
They go into a corridor.

Uh huh.  And her little hormones are going like a fire alarm.  I                        * say even money that physicist on                       * the bike is boinkin' her.                              *
No way.  Not Dana.
They stop at a door, like any other along the corridor. blank.
Okay.  Okay.  De-nail ain't just a river in Egypt.  She's probably stealing the money to pay for an abortion.
Will you just open the door!                           *
Gib touches a plastic card to an unmarked spot just above doorknob.  There is the CLUNK of a SOLENOID LOCK.
Or drugs.
They enter a long corridor, which is featureless except f video surveillance cameras.  They walk along the silence moment, then .  .  .
Twenty here, fifty there... I figured my wife's boyfriend was taking it.
I thought you moved out.
Well .  .  .  I moved back in. My lawyer said it would give me a better claim on the house in the property settlement.  Don't change the subject... you owe me two hundred bucks.
They approach another door, with a (bulletproof) glass wi in it.  Beyond is a brightly lit room, with a woman sitti a desk... and nothing else.  Gib presses a buzzer.

JANICE sits at the non-descript desk like a receptionist. she is a highly trained security specialist.  She is also through the shoulders, aggressively unattractive and utte humorless.  She watches them on a monitor screen as they outside the door.  Harry and Gib appear as living X-Ray i Their weapons are visible in their shoulder harnesses.  J puts one hand automatically on the butt of a .45 tucked i holster riveted beneath her desk.  She buzzes Harry and G with the other.
Gentlemen, please idenitify yourselves to the scanner.
Harry and Gib step up to the combination retinal-thumbpri voice scanners.  Harry presses his thumb against a black- plate for laser scan, and looks into the eye-piece of the retinal scanner.
Harry Tasker.  One zero zero two four.
Albert Gibson.  Three four nine nine one.
Their clearance appears on a monitor on Janice's desk.
Thank you.  You are cleared.
She stands to give them plastic I.D.  badges which they h around their necks.
Janice, how many years have you been buzzing us in?
Ten, Mr. Gibson.
And you still reach for your piece every time.
Yes sir.
God!  You have no idea how much that turns me on.  I've never had the courage to say this before but... I love you, Janice.
Yes, sir.

He kisses her wetly on the cheek as he goes by.  She does react is any discernible way. They pass through a heavy stainless steel door which open automatically.  Beyond is a kind of airlock... a SALLY PO Behind a lexan shield are TWO GUARDS armed with MP5s.  Th but do not speak at Harry and Gib pass them.
You better watch it.  She might file on you for sexual harassment.
In her dreams.

Gib and Harry pass through the inner door of the sally po into a large austere atrium. ANGLE FROM ABOVE as they cross.  A huge graphic logo cove floor.  Across the center is says OMEGA SECTOR.  In small print, around the perimeter, is the motto: "THE LAST LINE DEFENSE". They enter a high-tech office space.  It is a maze of gla partitions surrounding a central floor-space of cubicles. There is a hushed quality here.  People do not joke.  The not hurry.  There are a lot of computer screens displayin information from around the world.  It looks like a combi of NASA mission control and FBI headquarters. Fast Faisil greets them, yawning, as they pass his partit cubicle.
Come on, Fize.  We're late for our butt-grinding.
Faisil gulps his coffee and hurries after them.

A dark and severe conference room, with large-screen comp displays at one end.  Glowering at one end of the long, polished table, is SPENCER TRILBY, the chief of Omega Sec Visualize a cross between Colin Powel and J.  Edgar Hoove
Jesus, Harry!  You guys really screwed the pooch last night. Please tell me how I can look at this, that it's not a total pooch- screw.
Total is a strong word--
There are degrees of totality.
It's a scale really, with "perfect mission" on one end and "total pooch-screw" on the other and we're more about here--
Faisil.  You're new on Harry's team, aren't you?
Yes.
So what makes you think that the slack I cut him in any way translates to you?!
Sorry, sir.  Uh... here's what we got.
He hits a button and a photo of Khaled fills a wall-scree
Jamal Khaled.  We think he's dirty so we raid his financial files...  Check it out...
Faisil hits some buttons and a second screen lights up wi data for their raid.
One hundred million in wire transfers from the COMMERCE BANK                       * INTERNATIONAL--                                        *
Which we all know is a front for certain nations to fund terrorist                      * activities.  Something big is                          * going down --
And we know that a week ago four                       * MIRV warheads were smuggled out                        * of the former Soviet Republic of                       * Kazakhstan .  .  .
We think Khaled's group has                            * bought the nukes and is bringing                       * them to U.S.  soil.                                    *

So far this is not blowing my skirt up, gentleman.  Do you have                      * anything remotely substantial?                         * Don't be pumping beets up my ass                       * here.  Do you have hard data?                          *
Not what  you'd call rock hard.                        *
It's pretty limp, actually.                            *
Then perhaps you better get some                       * ... before somebody parks a car                        * in front of the White House with a nuclear weapon in the trunk!

It is the interior of a huge law office.  Helen works the a paralegal.  She is going to the break room for coffee w her friend, ALLISON, a secretary.  Allison is black, youn then Helen, and still single.

I mean, it's not like he's saving the world or anything.  He's a sales rep for Chrissakes. Whenever I can't get to sleep I ask him to tell me about his day. Six seconds and I'm out.  But he acts like he's curing cancer or something.
So I guess you didn't get away                         * for the weekend after all?                             *
Are you kidding?  Harry had to go out of town.
I'm shocked.
Yeah.  You know Harry.
Helen's nerdy boss BRAD, comes up behind her, scowling.
Helen, have you pulled those files yet?  I need them by lunch.
I won't let you down, Brad.
Brad leaves.

(under her breath)                                * You little pencil-neck.                                * (to Allison)                                      * So... yo... sista!  D'you do                           * anything interesting?
Oh... Eric and I drove up to this                      * little romantic inn, and...                            * pretty much lapped champagne out of each other's navels for two days.
You bitch.
Girlfriend, you got a man.  You                        * just have to take control .  . .  set up the right mood.                              *

The G-3 lifts into the night sky, turning south.

A small FREIGHTER is tied up to a half-crumbling pier.  N the pier is a dilapidated corrugated-metal warehouse buil two stories high.  There are floodlights on the dock but is black night, with the ghostly shapes of mangroves and It is an abandoned facility on what appears to be a tiny in the Caribbean. There is a lot of activity.  Three U-RENT TRUCKS are park the warehouse, as well as some other vehicles.  About thi men, clearly CRIMSON JIHAD TERRORISTS are busy at various activities.  Many of them carry AK47 assault rifles. MALIK is supervizing them as they finish unloading a tarp covered object about 15 feet high from the ship.  A rusti gantry crane trundles it into the warehouse.  Malik looks an AEROSPATIALE HELICOPTER thunders toward them over the Caribbean water. The helicopter lands and Juno steps down from the front d The sliding door is opened and Akbar and the others pull groggy Harry and Helen out of the aircraft.  They are cov by hoods. Malik walks up to them and pulls their hoods off.  Harry in his surroundings and looks back into the eyes of Malik Lethal energy flows between them.
Who is this woman?
His wife.
(seeing the possibilities) His wife?  Good.  Bring them.

Malik leads the entourage into the warehouse, where brill floodlights illuminate-- THREE HUGE STONE FIGURES, lined up in the middle of the s The tarp is removes from the object they just unloaded, revealing a FOURTH STATUE.  The figures are cracked and obscured by centuries, but they are unmistakably warriors mounted on horseback.  The legs and arms are missing on s but the massive heads and necks remain.
Incredible, aren't they?  Warrior figures from the Persian Empire of Darius the First, around 500 BC.  I call them "The Four Horsemen".
She approaches the nearest figure, caressing its flank. with a jackhammer steps up to her.
They're absolutely priceless.

She shrugs and nods to the man with the jackhammer.  He b right into the body of one of the Horseman, destroying it Stone fragments fall away, revealing a cavity cut with gr precision inside the figure. Inside is a BRIGHT METAL CONTAINER.  Four terrorists pull out and set it on the ground.  It is six feet long and co like.  Malik steps up to it, his eyes glistening.  A hush fallen over the group.
Open it.
The latches are released and the lid lifted.  Inside is machined metal object, roughly conical, about five feet l Malik signals to Harry to step closer and look.
Do you know what this is?
Can you give me a clue?  It could be a water heater for all I know.
Malik grabs Helen, jerking her roughly forward.  He whips a knife and inserts the point under Helen's jaw, forcing head back and drawing blood.
Do you know why you have been brought here?
N-no.
So that this man can verify to the world that Crimson Jihad is now a nuclear power.
How can Harry do that?  He's a salesman for chrissakes.
If we were wrong about him... then the last thing you see will be your blood spraying in his face.
Harry steps forward, his face grim.

This is a Soviet MIRV-Six, from an SS-22N launch vehicle.  The warhead contains 14.5 kilos of enriched uranium, with a plutonium trigger.  The nominal yield is 10 kilotons. (in Arabic, subtitled)                            * Release her and I'll cooperate.

Malik lowers the knife from her jaw.  He turns away from like she has ceased to exist and yells at the terrorists remove the other weapons.  Jackhammers tear into the ston figures. Helen is just staring at Harry, her mouth open.  He turns her, not knowing what to say.  He shrugs sheepishly.
What can I say?  I'm a spy.
She just looks at him for a long time.  She moves closer, staring and staring, letting it sink in.  Then she hauls and slugs him right in the jaw so hard is almost knocks h down.
You bastard!!  You lying son of a bitch!!
Terrorists grabs her and restrain her.  She starts to cry
I'm sorry, honey.
Don't call me honey!  You don't ever get to call me honey again. You understand?!  You pig!
Juno looks at them both and laughs.  She offers Helen a t
Here you go, dear.
NEARBY, Akbar is going through the contents of Helen's ha and Harry's wallet.  He rips open the bottom stitching an pulls out the geo-positioning transmitter.
Abu!  Look at this!                                    *
Malik looks at the tracker and then smashes it to the flo Helen looks at the crushed transmitter.  She stares at Ha with dawning realization.
You bugged me?!!
Juno cracks up at this.
The jet has become a mobile tactical-command center, with Faisil, and several other agents working out of portable equipment cases.  Faisil looks up from a computer screen suddenly.
We've lost the signal.
Gib, who has been pacing the aisile whirls to the screen.
Son of a bitch!  Where?
It's an island in the Keys, out                        * past Marathon.                                         *
Gib goes up to the cockpit.  They are on approach and the lights of Miami fill the front window.
Miami TCA, we are on final.
Call our DEA contact, tell him I want those choppers flight-ready the second we land.
TIGHT ON BLACK AND WHITE VIEWFINDER IMAGE of the terroris handycam.  Harry is speaking directly into the camera, finishing up his message.
...and I can verify that they have the arming box and all                            * equipment necessary to detonate the four warheads.  This is absolutely the real thing, gentlemen.
The camera swings off Harry to Malik, standing before the of the Jihad warriors, who are assembled behind the four
You have killed our women and                          * children, bombed our cities from afar like cowards, and dare to call us terrorists--

Over the image of Malik, a LOW-BATTERY warning begins to CUT TO SCENE, as Malik speaks into the camera, which is h one of his men.  The CAMERAMAN is sweating, wondering if should interrupt.  He gulps nervously as Malik drones on.

-- But now the Oppressed have                          * been given a mighty sword, to                          * strike back at their enemies.                          * Unless the US pulls all military forces out of the Persian Gulf area, immediately and forever, Crimson Jihad will rain fire on one major US city each week until these demands are met...
BACK TO VIEWFINDER IMAGE.  BATTERY warning flashing faste
... First one weapon will be detonated on this uninhabited island as a demonstration of Crimson Jihad's power and our willingness to be humanitarian. However, if there demands are not--
In a burst of static the image GOES BLACK. The cameraman nervously lowers the camera, ashen faced. Malik's eyes are black with murder.
Battery, Abu.
Get another one, you moron!

A filthy, crumbling cinderblock building (near the wareho A few bare light bulbs with bugs zipping around then, and glass in the windows.  Harry and Helen are brought in by TERRORIST GUARDS.  Juno follows then into the bleak room. Guards shackle them to steel chairs with handcuffs. A MAN enters the room carrying a small suitcase.  He has like features.  He opens the suitcase and Harry has a goo of the contents:  medical instruments, needle-probes, dri Dremel tools with saw blades.
This is Samir.  See if you can guess his specialty.
Oral hygiene?
Not exactly.
(scared) What's going on, Harry?

Samir is just going to ask Harry a few questions.  See, we're not even sure which agency Harry works for.  Now, Samir is absolutely first class, but on the other hand we have Harry, here, who has managed to lie convincingly to the woman he loves for 15 years.  So it will be interesting to see how long he can resist.
(holding up a syringe) This will help.
Samir injects Harry in the arm with the syringe.
You know, you should swab that with alcohol.  I might get an infection.
I'll return when this has taken                        * effect.  Then we'll talk.                              *
I'm looking forward to it.                             *
Samir exits.
Why are you helping these raving psychotics.
Because they're very well-funded raving psychotics, and I'm getting a lot of money.
She kneels down in front of Harry, stroking his leg.

You think I care about their                           * cause?  Or yours?  Not at all.                         * See, America is on top now .  .                        * .  but so was Rome, once.  All                         * civilizations crumble.  One nation succeeding over another. What does it mean in the long run?  The only important thing is to live well.  And...  living                          * well takes money.                                      *
You're damaged goods, lady.
Harry's words are beginning to be slightly slurred.  The are taking effect.
(indicating Helen) Did you tell her about us, Harry?
There is no us, you psychotic bitch.
Sure.  Say that now.
Juno puts her arms around him and kisses him passionately breaks, looking at Helen to savor the effect.  Helen is trembling with rage.
Thanks for everything, Harry.  It was good while it lasted.

Juno crosses to the guard and takes a hand-grenade off hi belt.  Then she goes to Helen and places it between her k She pushes Helen's knees together to hold the spoon again grenade then pulls the pin.
Now just keep your knees together, and you'll be fine.
Something you obviously have a hard time doing!
Hold that thought.
Juno leaves.  Harry looks dopily at Helen.
There was nothing.  I swear.
Helen doesn't believe him, and why should she.  She looks from staring at the grenade, to see that Harry's head has slumped forward.
What did he give you?
(groggy) Sodium amytal, maybe some other truth agent.
It makes you tell the truth?
Yes.
Is it working yet?
Ask me a question I would normally lie to.
Are we going to die?
Yup.                                                   *
I'd say it's working.
They'll either torture us to death, shoot us in the head, or leave us until the bomb goes off.
Okay, okay.  I get it.  How long                       * have you been a spy, Harry?
17 years.
My God.  Have you had to...  have sex with other women in the line of duty?
I don't take those assignments.
What about Juno?
She's really a fox, isn't she?
Did you pork her Harry?
No. (pause) But I wanted to.
(crying) Are you a total lying, scumsucking pig Harry?
Looks that way.

ON MALIK as he pokes through Harry and Helen's stuff on t table.  He picks up Helen's wallet and opens it.  ECU WAL a picture of Harry, Helen and Dana.  Malik stares at it a moment.  Then motions to one of his men.
Samir lifts Harry's head and sees that he is pretty shitf
Is there anything you would like to tell me before we start?
Yes.  I'm going to kill you pretty soon.
(calmly preparing his instruments) I see.  How exactly?
Well, I thought I'd break your neck, then use you as a human shield, then kill the guard with that knife there on your table and take his gun.
Samir approaches Harry with a long steel needle probe.
(humoring Harry) And what makes you think you can do all that?
Because I picked the lock on these handcuffs...

He holds them up to show Samir.  Then he explodes out of chair-- Breaks the torturer's neck-- Spins him between hi and the guard-- Who then hesitates to fire-- Giving Harry split second he needs to grab the knife from the table an throw it into the guard's eye, killing him instantly. Helen is flat blown away.  Wow.  It only took a few secon Harry to reverse the situation.  Her Harry!  He picks up guard's 9mm pistol and staggers over to her.
Don't move.

He kneels down in front of her.  Gently he slips his hand between her thighs, getting a grip on the grenade, then s his fingers slowly over the spoon to hold it securely. He stops moving, suddenly.  She realizes with a sudden jo terror that he has frozen.
What is it?
(staring transfixed) God, you have great legs.
Harry... snap out of it!
She sees how shitfaced he is.  He holds the grenade up, g safely so the spoon can't fly off.
Go it, baby.
Harry and Helen emerge from the building, creeping throug shadows.  She stops him for a second.  Gets very close to whispering, crouched in the shadows.
Tell me something before this stuff wears off and you start lying again.
What?
Do you still love me?
Yes.
As much as you used to?
No. (she deflates) Much more.
She looks into his eyes, and knows he is telling the trut
(grinning)                                        * It wore off.
At that moment, they hear yelling from the cinder-block building.
They found the bodies.  Come on--

Harry takes her hand and they sprint for cover at the edg the mangrove swamp.  A LIGHT HITS THEM.  TWO TERRORISTS, running around the corner, open fire with AK47s just as H and Helen reach a cluster of palm trees.  The trunks expl with bullet hits as they run through the darkness. As the two terrorists move through the trees, Harry lunge the shadows and grabs one from behind.  He wrests his rif away and swings it at the other, knocking his AK down.  T first terrorist draws a knife and slashes at him, but Har grabs his knife arm and swings the blade into his partner Then he elbow smashes the first guy and seizes him in a t hand neck-breaker-- SNAP. Two more run around the corner of a building.  Harry stom foot down on one of the AKs, which is lying across a log. flips into the air and he catches it in firing position . .  and takes them out with two well-aimed bursts.  Helen out of the shadows staring at Harry in amazement.  His sh ripped, he is scratched and bleeding, holding an assault expertly and scanning the brush like a feral animal.
I married Rambo.                                       *
He grabs her and kisses her passionately.
Let's go.
250 thru   OMITTED 253

LOOKING DOWN FROM A CATWALK on the activity below the fou horsemen statues and several utility trucks almost fill t floorspace.  A rental truck is being loaded with conventi weapons, including machine guns and several HAND-LAUNCHED STINGER MISSILES.  One of the nukes has been lowered into cut in the concrete floor.  Malik and most of the terrori are gathered around it. A GUARD, F.G.  on the catwalk, watches intently from the railing.  So intently that he doesn't head Harry sneak up him.  SNAP.  Harry catches the guard's MAC-10 machine pis before it can hit the floor.  He and Helen crouch behind steel pillar, watching the proceedings below.  Helen keep glancing at the dead guard, killed so effortlessly a mome before by her husband.  It is all surreal. BELOW, MALIK is shouting in his native language.  He pull chain from around his neck and holds up a METAL ARMING KE Then jumps down into the pit and inserts it into the warh arming computer.  Harry is listening intently, translatin Helen.

In ninety minutes a pillar of                          * holy fire will rise at this place                      * as a sign to out enemies.                              * (Malik theatrically turns the arming key) It is done...
Malik jumps out of the pit.  He signals and terrorists po concrete into the pit, covering the bomb.  He begins rant again.
Now no man can stop us.  We are set on our course.  No force can stop us... (as libbing) ... we're cool, we're badass, blah blah.

Malik raises his fist and chants some Crimson Jihad sloga The terrorists echo and chant and then cheer, firing thei in the air.  Harry pulls Helen back as ricochets clatter over the inside of the metal building. Malik shouts something and all the terrorists go back to at double time.  They are loading warheads Two and Three trucks (one per truck) and the last, number Four, is bein wheeled out on a cart to the Aerospatiale outside.
If we're on an island, why are they using trucks?
We must be in the Florida Keys .                       * .  .  the Overseas Highway                             * connects the islands to the mainland.
So there's no border, no customs.                      * They can just drive anywhere they                      * want .  .  .  there's nothing to                       * stop them .  .  .
Just us.
What are you going to do?
(shrugs, like: what do you think?) Go down there and kill everybody, I guess.
He hands her the MAC-10.  She holds it clumsily.
Oh shit.
Wait here.  If you have to use this, use it.  Don't choke. Okay?
She nods gamely and Harry starts down the steel stairs to floor below.

ON HARRY, reaching the floor.  He slips behind some packi crates.  Then swings into action-- He hurls the grenade a as he can, down to the other end of the building.  KABOOM uses the distraction to move forward.  But it goes wrong right away...  A TERRORIST comes around a corner behind h shouts-- Harry dives for cover as the guy fires, but-- He on a pipe and goes sprawling-- Losing the AK47, which sli under some equipment and-- Seven terrorists run toward hi with guns raised.
(to Helen) SHOOT!!

HELEN fires a burst at the terrorists, actually hitting o But-- The recoil knocks her back, into a metal column, an gun FLIES OUT OF HER HANDS. It falls to the metal steps and hits-- Going off.  B-B-BL The burst kills two more terrorists, and-- The Mac-10 cartwheels and hits further down.  ANOTHER BURST.  Anothe terrorist is splattered. It spins and hits another step-- ANOTHER RANDOM BURST

head_text.subj: MIRACULOUSLY KILLS THE LAST TWO TERRORISTS

text: She has inadvertently saved her husband.  Harry looks up behind cover-- to see all seven dead.  Now it's his turn amazed.  He signals to her to run... get off the exposed catwalk.  She makes it through the door to the outside st as bullets start hitting the steel walls behind her.

A TERRORIST with a knife runs at the unarmed Harry.  Harr snatches up a jack-hammer and BRAT-TAT-TAT-- Drives it in guy's chest.  Then he-- Grabs an AK from one of the falle terrorists and opens fire.  Malik shouts to the drivers o trucks to get going.  The other terrorists return fire at Who sprints from cover to cover, reaching a side door-- W he rakes one of the passing trucks with a burst-- But terrorists behind him in the building have a clear shot a rounds hit the wall next to him as he-- Dives through the
--landing outside.  He takes cover behind an aircraft REF TRUCK.  Not a good place.  He is pinned down by automatic weapons fire.  He looks around for Helen, who is--
50 yards away.  She is unarmed and unable to help.

HARRY cranks up the pump on the refueling truck and grabs nozzle of the hose.  He opens the flow and-- A stream of FUEL blasts out of the nozzle and-- Harry fires his AK ri across the nozzle-- The muzzle-blast ignites the av-gas a has a flame thrower with a 70 foot reach. Harry, lit demonically by the inferno, paints the whole a setting vehicles afire, and scattering the terrorists.
Through the flames and smoke he sees one of the men hand a LAW rocket.  Malik snaps it to his shoulder, preparing fire.

Harry runs toward the edge of the dock thirty feet away a MALIK fires.  The rocket shoots toward the truck and-- Ha leaps toward the dark water as-- KABOOOM!  Behind him the truck EXPLODES IN A HUGE FIREBALL.
dives down.  An instant later a sheet of fire sweeps acro surface above him.  Harry kicks hard, trying to swim beyo inferno above him so he can surface.
CLOSE ON HELEN, watching the burning wreckage of the gas
Oh my God.  Harry.
A PISTOL ENTERS FRAME.  Its muzzle taps the back of her h She gasps and turns to see-- JUNO, holding the weapon exp
My condolences to the window.                          *

Juno grabs her and yanks her to her feet.  Helen SLAPS JU HARD.  Juno has a slash across her cheek.  Blood trickles She grabs Helen's hand and viciously turns it, seeing the wedding ring turned inward, the diamond on the palm-side. face darkens with fury and she points the gun at Helen's preparing to kill her .  .  . And Malik's hand grabs her wrist, stopping her.
Not now.  We may need a hostage.                       *
Juno grabs her and twists her around, pushing her toward limo nearby.
Let's go, Suzy Homemaker.
Harry is still swimming.  He reaches the edge of the fire surfaces, gasping for breath.  Treading water he scans th dock.
Amid the fire and smoke, he sees Juno walking Helen at gu point toward a LIMO.

TRACKING WITH JUNO, approaching the car.  Malik passes, j into the Aerospatiale with his few remaining men.  The fo bomb is clearly visible as the sliding door is closed.  T copter pulls pitch, fanning the flames of the inferno bel it arcs away. AKBAR, the 300 pound terrorist/chauffeur opens the door a Juno gets into the limo with Helen.  Akbar scrunches into front seat and starts the car.

There is just enough light to see some geography.  The is is very tiny.  Running right over it and to the horizon i directions is the OVERSEAS HIGHWAY.  The terrorists' truc rumble up an on-ramp past a sign that says MIAMI - 110. limo is the last member of the convoy.  The Aerospatiale overhead, hugging the deck, headed for Miami at 150 knots

It looks like the aftermath of a battle... burning wrecka black smoke, bodies.  Not a living soul around.  The smok swirls as two big BELL 206 HELICOPTERS settle on the midd the dock.  GIB jumps out of the nearest with an AR-15, sc the wreckage.  Several of his men, and a couple of DEA ag spread out.  Gib breaks into a grin as he sees-- HARRY, materializing out of the swirling smoke.  Dripping clothes ripped and bloody.  But okay.
I thought this look like your work.
Let's go.  I'll brief you in the air.
You're welcome.

Gib and Harry are working out of brief-case mobile com-un Several Omega agents with headsets are reading maps, givi commands, coordinating the evacuation, mobilizing their o forces.  The energy is controlled but very high, everybod talking at once.  This is the day they all have trained f It is impressive to watch.
--you tell the son of bitch this is  Bright Boy Alert.  Repeat, a Bright Boy Alert.  And I need a patch of the White House ASAP. That's right--
(overlapping) ... the Coast Guard has to clear them back to a twenty mile radius.  Anybody that can't make the minimum safe distance we need an airlift on, immediately--
Gib whips around to Harry, lowering his headset mike.
I can get 3 Marine Corps Harriers here in about 12 minutes. They're on maneuvers out of Boca Chica.
(checking his watch) Get 'em.  I'll brief them on the way in.
TRAFFIC on the two causeways is almost non-existent this in the morning.  The three rental trucks, followed by the about a mile back, are almost the only vehicles.
Juno has a 9mm pistol aimed at Helen.  She opens the sunr letting in the morning air and light.  Then pours herself Scotch from the bar.
Like one?
(eyes like steel) Fuck you.
HARRY AND GIB are both talking a mile a minute, coordinat the evacuation of the highway and the surrounding area.
... well get the Highway Patrol to go through the streets and tell everybody on their damn loudspeakers.  Just the basics... get away from windows, don't look at it... yeah--
Here they come.
Gib looks out the window in time to see-- THREE hunch-winged P.S.T.O.L.  HARRIER jets pass them at knots.
(to the pilots) Roger, Mike Three Five, you are cleared to engage.  Be advised, your targets have Stingers and light machine guns.
The pilot, like all jet pilots, seems icy calm.
Copy that, Bright Boy command. (to his wingman) Tally ho.

The terrorists see the Harriers approaching on a low atta run, and scramble to get out their Stingers. The Harriers open fire with cannons and rocket pods on th trucks below.  The 20mm cannons rip the ocean on either s the causeway into plumes of spray.
One of the Bomb trucks is hit.  It explodes and flies off bridge into the water.  The terrorists on one of the othe trucks fire a Stinger missile.
It arrows up, blowing one wing off the lead Harrier.  The ejects as the plane cartwheels into the sea and explodes.
Harry sees the battle far ahead... the exploding jet.
(to the pilots) Recommend you use your Mavericks                       * to take out the bridge.                                *
They won't set off those nukes will they?
Negative, Mike Three Five. That's a negative. (low, to Gib) Probably not.
The two remaining Harriers make an attack run, launching Maverick missiles at the bridge.
The missiles hit the support trestles ahead of the trucks .  .  .  K-BOOOOM!!  A whole section of the concrete span collapses into the water.
The first truck is consumed in the blast.  The last truck slides to the edge of the gap and stops.

Juno is trying to see what's going on ahead.  All they ca is smoke and explosions.  Akbar is speaking heatedly (in Arabic) into a walky talky and getting no answer. Helen uses this moment of distraction to lunge forward, grabbing the gun.  Juno fires wildly as they struggle for control of the weapon.  The sound is deafening in the tin space.  The second shot catches Akbar behind the ear, and slumps forward.  His foot mashes down on the accelerator and the car surges faster.
The third Harrier fires its 2.75 Rockets and blows the remaining truck into tinfoil.  Battle over.  Two bombs do
The columns of smoke from the battle are still a couple m ahead of the copter.
Good shooting, Mike Three Five. I need you to stay on station. (to the copter pilot)                             * Okay.  You see that limo?
THE LIMO tracks lazily back and forth across the lanes fr guardrail to the other, throwing sheets of sparks where i hits.  In is funneling along the causeway, unslowed, like of-control-train.
INSIDE, Helen knocks Juno's hands against the edge of the sunroof and the pistol goes flying out.
You... bitch!!

Helen is raging, grabbing Juno's head and pounding it aga anything hard she can find inside the car.  Suddenly she looking out the front window.  Juno turns too, off her lo see-- ANGLE THROUGH THE WINDSHIELD.  The causeway is blow about a quarter mile ahead.
Shit!
Juno climbs through the window into the front seat, tuggi the dead driver.  The heavyset Akbar is like a bag of cem Helen look up through the sunroof and sees--
THE BELL 206 COPTER, descending rapidly.  Harry is climbi onto the skids.  He hooks on arm and leg over the skid an hangs down as low as he can.  HELEN stands up in the open and waves her arms.
Gib is yelling at the DEA pilot, who's not thrilled with idea.
Get lower, goddamnit!  Right now!

Harry strains downward with one hand.  Helen reaches up t him.  The car screeches along the guard-rail, slamming ag it, throwing her from side to side in the sunroof.  Their fingers touch, then separate.  She looks-- the limo is al on the precipice.
INSIDE THE CAR, Juno is desperately pulling on the inert driver.  He slumps over on her, pinning her.  She looks o the dash as the shattered edge of the causeway rushes tow them--

HARRY'S HAND grabs Helen's.  He pulls her out of the car as the limo clears the edge.  She is jerked through the sunroof, screaming.  The car falls away, arcing gracefull the ocean below.  It hits with an enormous explosion of w

HARRY PULLS HELEN up onto the skid with him, getting her stable.  She is gasping, holding on for dear life.  She l down at the ocean, the burning wreckage on the bridge, th whole unbelievable panorama. Then she looks at Harry and-- Grins.  She's alive!  And s he.  And not only that, this is the biggest rush of her l Harry grins back.  Surprised and pleased that she is more soul-mate than he ever knew.
ANGLE ON A HARRIER, landing in full-hover on the causeway shriek of the jet engine is enormous.  It bounces down on wheels like a big inscect.  The other remaining Harrier i already down, behind it.

TRACKING past burning wreckage to Harry's Bell 206 just settling on the highway.  B.G.  the other DEA Bell 206 is landing with the Harrier pilot who ejected hanging in a s Harry jumps out of the open door, followed by Helen and G Harry looks at his watch.
Any minute now.
(with a megaphone/ to everybody) It's show time.  Don't look at                         * the flash.  Do not look at the flash.
(to Helen)                                        * We're safe here.                                       *

Helen and Harry move away from the agents.  They are safe together.  They look at each other, and there is nothing say.  Harry removes her wedding band from the wrong hand slips it back onto its rightful finger. He leans forward to kiss her.  She reaches for him.  Thei meet.

And they are locked together in that position when the sk lights up behind them.  Talk about fireworks.  Harry cove eyes and they stay in the kiss. They are in no danger, but the effect is stunning.  The c mushroom cloud appears at the horizon.  Helen watches, aw the most glorious and terrifying sight of our age.
That was some kiss.                                    *

The two young Harrier pilots stand nearby, watching the mushroom disperse.  Gib is with the other Omega agents, h finger pressed in his ear, listening to his headset.  He to Harry to come to him. Harry detaches from Helen and walks over to him.  Helen w him go... back to work.  She glances over at the two Harr pilots.
(to the pilots) That's my husband.
HARRY goes into the huddle with Gib and the others.

Malik's copter landed twenty minutes ago in Miami.  He's on the top of a high-rise downtown. SWAT's on the scene, and I got the cops sealing off the area.                         * He renezvous'd there with about                        * a dozen more faction members.                          * They're barricaded on the                              * twentieth floor. (he gets very serious)                            * Harry, they have a hostage.  It's                      * Dana.                                                  *
My Dana!?
They must have grabbed her during the night... we didn't know. Sorry, Harry, I--
But Harry is already moving.  He sprints toward the neare Harrier, witch is idling nearby.  Gib runs after him.
Harry!  We'll get her out!  We                         * have a man inside already .  .                         * .  Harry!!  Aw, shit... here we go.
Harry walks up to the young pilot...
I need to borrow this thing for a few minutes.
He pushes past the pilot before the guy can react.
Excuse me .  .  .  sir?!                               *
Force Comm cleared you to give us                      * total cooperation, right?                              *
Yessir, but .  .  .                                    *
That's coming right from the                           * President, Captain.                                    *
Yessir.  Uh .  .  .  sir?  You're                      * going to have to sign for the                          * aircraft.                                              *

I'll sign for it.  You got a pen?                      * (one of the agents                                * pulls out a pen)                                 * Here, he'll sign for it.                               *
Harry is in the cockpit by now.  Gib climbs up.
I'd like to remind you that it has been ten years since you were actually in one of these.
If I break it they can take it out of my pay.

Harry doesn't have a G-suit or a helmet of anything.  He has his walky on his belt. INSIDE THE CRAMPED COCKPIT, Harry looks around for the le which vectors the thrust.  Finds it, and sets it to 90 de (vertical).  He bangs the canopy closed and brings the th up to FULL.
(to pilot) It'll be fine.  He's got hundreds of hours in Harriers.  Joint-ops, cross-training and all that.
Harry can fly anything.
The big plane wobbles off the ground like a drunken bumbl
He's a little rusty.  It's like riding a bicycle .  .  .  you never forget.  Uh .  .  .  I'd seek shelter!

It drifts sideways and everybody runs to get out of the w At about six feet above the ground it slides sideways, cl the top of a cop car and knocks off the light bar.  It li unsteadily straight into the sky.  It turns around 180.
He's got it.
Sorry.
Harry pushes the vector lever forward and the thrust-nozz turn, accelerating the plane forward.
Gib is standing, watching Harry go.  He never believes th guy.  Harry's voice comes over the walky...
Tell Helen what's going on.  Tell her I love her.  And ask the pilot where the button for the 20mm cannon is-- never mind.  I found it.
The plane disappears toward Miami.

AN AERIAL SHOT, circling the building.  It is an unfinish building in the high rise district.  The Aerospatiale sit the roof, its rotor turning slowly.  The street below is with cars.  Honking horns echo up the glass canyons.
ANGLE AT STREETLEVEL as cops use bullhorns and bad attitu clear the street around the building, setting up a perime two blocks away.

INSIDE THE HIGH RISE the terrorists have barricaded thems on the twentieth floor.  There are 12 TERRORISTS, all wit automatic weapons.  Occasionally one of them will fire a down a stairwell with an AK-47.  Miami-Dade SWAT team mem are deployed in the stairwell but are keeping their dista

Malik is sequestered with the bomb.  It sits on the floor still in its shipping case.  Dana stands nearby, looking scares.  She is not ties up.  Where can she go? She watches Malik go to the warhead and insert his arming He has a TV set up on some crates, and we see that his vi tapes demands are running on CNN.  Harry's face fills the screen, verifying the the nuclear weapons as a real threa is identified at the bottom of the screen as HARRY TASKER ATOMIC ENERGY COMMISSION.  Dana stares at her father's fa the national news.  It's like a bad dream.  She has been but she is fairly composed now.
I have to go to the bathroom.
The terrorists ignore her.  A terrified ACTION NEWS REPOR and his CAMERAMAN, under guard by TWO TERRORISTS, are has setting up to shoot Malik.
Tape is rolling.

This is a communique from Crimson Jihad.  You have heard from your own expert.  You have seen the Holy fire with your own eyes.  Do not force us to destroy this city.  And do not try to use force against us.  I can trigger this bomb instantly.  All I have to do is turn that key... (he points fiercely at the bomb) ... and five million of your people will die.
The reporter glances down, nervously.
What key?
(pointing like the guy's blind) That key right there!
Malik looks down.  The key is gone.
(to his men) Someone has stolen the key!
He turns, looking around wildly.  Malik then sees Dana ru for the stairwell to the roof.  He pulls a pistol and sho her, but hits the wall as she bangs through the door.  He after her.

ON THE ROOF, Malik bursts through the stairwell door.  Hi MEN have followed him.  Malik stops suddenly when he sees Dana standing at the edge of the roof.  She is holding th ARMING KEY by its chain.  Dangling it over the edge.  He signals to his men not to fire.
(terrified, but thinking) You shoot me, this'll fall.
Malik advances slowly, his eyes glistening ferally.  She up a step with each of his, moving along the edge of the Malik keeps his pistol aimed at her chest.
Don't come any closer.  I'll drop it!  I swear to God.
If you drop it, I will have no reason not to kill you.
He advances, calling her bluff.  She backs away from him the edge.
Come on, child.  Give me the key. (smiling) Don't you want to live?  I give you my word.
No way you whacko.

She reaches the corner of the building.  Her back touches something.  it is the boom of a small crane, used for lif building supplies.  Careful to keep the key dangling over space, Dana climbs up on the lattice-work boom and moves beyond the edge of the building, never taking her eyes of Malik.  She is hyperventilating, terrified, but thinking clearly. Malik steps up on the crane, crawling out after her.  He she will not drop the key as long as he has the gun.  It game which will end when she reaches the end of the boom. puts the key between her teeth so she can hang on better. is windy and the boom is swinging.
The Crimson Jihad warriors hear a thunderous, shrieking r and look toward the window.

head_text.subj: RISING INTO VIEW, LIKE A GARGOYLE FROM HELL, IS THE HARRI

text: It fills the windows completely, hovering only a few feet outside.  The terrorists raise their AK-47s to fire just Harry hits the 20mm nose-cannon.
Glass explodes into glittering mist, and terrorists explo into bloody spray as Harry pivots the plane and the canno sweeps the floor clear from side to side.  The Crimson Ji vaporized.
Malik hears the thunder of the jet and the firing, but fr where he is he can't see what's going on.  He focuses on key.  He must have that key.

Malik's TWO REMAINING MEN run to the helicopter, gesticul to the pilot to get ready to take off.  The pilot revs th turbine and the rotor whirls faster.  The two men jump in picking up M-60 machine guns.

MALIK IS STILL ADVANCING out the crane boom.  Dana slips backs up, toppling off the boom.  She is hanging now by h hands over a 20 story drop. Malik is almost to her.  He needs a hand free to grab her sets his gun down on the girder.  He grabs for her wrist.
ANGLE LOOKING DOWN.  Malik, Dana, the street far below. an unbelievable roar the Harrier sweeps in beneath Dana, FILLING FRAME.

Harry has the canopy up.  Malik sees Harry, ten feet belo His eyes narrow with an all-consuming rage.  He glances a pistol on the beam.  Back at the girl, the key in her tee So close. Harry maneuvers the cockpit directly under Dana.
(shouting) Let go baby!  I've got you! Daddy's got you!

Malik lunges for her wrist.  She screams and lets go-- Da drops and hits the windshield of the hovering jet-- Harry her with his left hand, right hand still on the stick-- H holds her until she can get a grip.  She is lying across nose of the plane.  Harry starts to bank away and--
Malik shrieks in rage.  He grabs his 9mm pistol and leaps the crane--
Onto the back of the plane.  He starts crawling toward th cockpit.  Dana screams and Harry looks back, but just the
The Aerospatiale swings around the building right in fron them-- The door-gunner OPENS FIRE.

Harry banks hard, taking the hits under the wing.  He piv and slides sideways around the building, playing tag with copter. He can't do anything radical enough to dislodge Malik wit tossing off his own daughter.
The helicopter appears around the corner, guns blazing in doors.  Harry pivots the plane and FIRES THE NOSE CANNON. helicopter is riddled.  It tilts and plummets, auto-rotat out of control.
As the copter hits the ground and explodes.  Fortunately police had created a cleared perimeter.

THE HARRIER dips and slews, half out of control.  Malik i taking aim with the pistol, right at Harry's head.  Harry his daughter with his left hand, holding her with all his strength and he-- Jinks the stick hard, just as-- Malik o fire, but-- The plane tilts wildly and Malik topples, scr He slides along the wing, and falls over the leading edge Only to catch himself on the only available hand-hold-- T last Sidewinder missile.
Harry and Malik lock eyes for one long second.  Then Harr the FIRING STUD.  The Sidewinder drops away and ignites. Carrying Malik out over Miami Beach.  It explodes a mile sea.
HARRY PULLS DANA into the cockpit, settling her on his la
Don't touch the stick, baby.
She stares at her father in amazement.  He banks away fro building, accelerating the jet.  He grins at her.  Raises eyebrow.  Woggles the plane's wings.
Hi, pumpkin.
Dinner at home, and everybody's there.  We come in on the of some story that everybody thinks is hysterical.
... you should have seen your father, standing there all covered with spaghetti sauce.  He looked like such a dope.
I told the guy--- (snorts, it's too funny) I told the guy, this isn't even my order.
Dana is laughing too, a part of it.  They are happy.  The a family.  Dana gets up, her meal half-eaten as usual.
I'm done.
She heads for the front door.
I seem to remember something about a history project that's due tomorrow.
( busted) Dad.  You just think you know everything, don't you?
Dana trudges off to her room to do her homework.  The pho rings.  Helen answers.
Boris and Doris?
(calmly, signalling Harry with her eyes) Go ahead.

It is a black tie affair.  Very glitzy.  CAMERA SWOOPS ov guests, sipping champagne and dancing.  It is an embassy very international.  HARRY AND HELEN work their way throu crowd.  He is in tux, hair slicked back, looking rakish. is elegant in a low-cut gown and diamond choker. Harry scoops two glasses of champagne off a passing tray hands her one.
VERY CLOSE ON GIB, hunches in a dark van someplace nearby speaks into his headset mike.
So, what's the scoop, team?  You see your contact yet?
HELEN AND HARRY smile and nod as if they know people.  Sp very low, Helen answer Gib via SUB-VOCAL transceiver.
Not yet.  But we'll find him.
Dance?
He whirls her across the floor and the CAMERA PULLS BACK as they dance.
